snippet: A jury on Wednesday awarded $240 million to 32 mentally disabled men for what government lawyers say was years of abuse by a Texas company that arranged for them to work at an Iowa turkey-processing plant.
abstract: Federal jury in Iowa awards $240 million to 32 mentally disabled men for years of abuse by Henry's Turkey Service, Texas company that arranged for them to work at Iowa turkey-processing plant and oversaw their care, work and lodging; award is largest in 48-year history of Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.
lead_paragraph: A jury on Wednesday awarded $240 million to 32 mentally disabled men for what government lawyers say was years of abuse by a Texas company that arranged for them to work at an Iowa turkey-processing plant.

headline.main: Iowa: Disabled Workers Awarded Record Judgment in Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Disabled Workers Awarded Record Judgment In Abuse Case
